mapper.sql: id, deviceType, deviceToken, deviceId, modifyTime, createTime
mapper.insert:
insert into device
id,
deviceType,
deviceToken,
deviceId,
modifyTime,
createTime,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{deviceType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{deviceToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update device
deviceType = #{deviceType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
deviceToken = #{deviceToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deviceId = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifyTime = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update device set deviceType = #{deviceType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, deviceToken = #{deviceToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deviceId = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
